Tuesday 4th October 2011
Conjunctivitis.
Dear Parents,
I am writing to inform you that we have had some cases of conjunctivitis in the Foundation Stage. If you notice any of the following symptoms:
Redness of the eye Itchy, sore, burning and sometimes painful The eye may discharge white/yellow pus.
Please keep your child at home and follow required treatment. Bathing of the eye with cooled boiled water is recommended and you can seek medical advice. After 48 hours of treatment your child can come back to school.
Thank you for your understanding and support with this matter.
Yours sincerely,
Miss Austin.
Foundation Stage Leader.
